articles.author: Usama Jawad
articles.title: Slack is getting a major redesign to look more like Microsoft Teams - XDA Developers
articles.description: Slack is rolling out a major redesign for its collaboration app. The interface changes arguably make it look more like its rival, Microsoft Teams.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
  • Slack has announced a redesign of its app, making it look more like Microsoft Teams, with faster navigation and increased emphasis on tasks for improved productivity.
